official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the medicare program of modified bicycle ergometers and modified treadmills.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include modified bicycle ergometers and modified treadmills in the definition of "medical and other health services."

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the medicare program of modified bicycle ergometers and modified treadmills.
